name: DinoMania (HiroGaming66)
description:
Hello for the last time this year
At the final of this rough year, I want to leave your 2020 with a small gift.
This is a local platform game where you have to beat your friends or family so you can win while you have fun.
The game right features: 
4 different characters;
4 arenas;
6 powerups;

Can be played with 4 players!
I really hope you have some fun in this last week of the year!
Happy 2021!
